806180.name: Beyond The Heavens
806180.description:
Beyond The Heavens is a arcade style shoot-em-up where you take control of a ship seeking to reach the destination that calls out to it.

The journey will take place across several worlds including Heaven and Hell!

Features

  • Upgrade ship and weapons

  • Various ship skins

  • Change your ship weapon load-out from 4 unique weapons

  • Super Laser that clears bullets and enemies

  • Ultra AOE that unleashes energy collected from fallen enemies to clear the screen of all bullets and enemies

  • Original soundtrack that can be listened to at leisure via the in-game Jukebox

  • 11 Unique levels each with their own hazards and enemy patterns
806180.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
